title: Buycoin.Online
author: Buycoin.Online
content: You can buy Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Tether (USDT) or another cryptocurrency in just two clicks.We work 24/7Requests are processed automatically.Processing time is a few minutes.With us, you get: Profitable coursesThe most profitable course of world cryptocurrency exchanges.SpeedAutomatic exchange in just a few minutes.Large reserveAny cryptocurrency and fiat funds in the right quantities.Many exchange directionsA wide selection of payment systems for withdrawing funds.Exchange securityMultilevel protection of your funds at the time of transaction.Cryptocurrency VerificationChecking cryptocurrency for cleanliness at our expense.Referral programTwo-level referral loyalty program and cashback.We have been working in the financial market since 2011. Thanks to this, we know all the nuances of the industry and can advise on almost any issue.Buycoin.online supports the exchange of more than 35 crypto coins, such as: Bitcoin (BTC), Litecoin (LTC), Bitcoin Cash (BCH), Bitcoin SV (BSV), Tether (USDT), Zcash (ZEC), Monero (XMR), Ethereum (ETH), Ethereum Classic, (ETC), NEO (NEO), Dash (DASH), Dogecoin (DOGE) and many other cryptocurrencies. You can exchange virtual money both in exchange for another cryptocurrency, and with the help of bank cards. The following exchange directions are available on the site: SEPA EUR, Revolut EUR, Visa/MasterCard EUR, Visa/MasterCard USD, Visa/MasterCard UAH, PrivatBank UAH, Monobank UAH.Become one of our premium clients. Start working with us right now!  https://buycoin.online/?traffic=rLPHwfG8_thPKEwBH0XDNKMVSMrY5lKlshGvk6mNls4BTC info@buycoin.onlinetwitter.com/BuycoinOnlinechat.whatsapp.com/HtXNfHlzVGYJVYvsblTpbft.me/Buycoin_Online

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: Quote from: Buycoin.Online on December 13, 2023, 02:40:20 PMWe have been working in the financial market since 2011. Thanks to this, we know all the nuances of the industry and can advise on almost any issue.What shows that you have been working in financial markets since 2011? I don't see any data supporting this, and it could bring confidence to your clients if it was readily available.Your domain names aren't that old, so most people would definitely think you are lying.

comments.author: Buycoin.Online
comments.body: Quote from: JeromeTash on December 13, 2023, 09:33:22 PMWhat shows that you have been working in financial markets since 2011? I don't see any data supporting this, and it could bring confidence to your clients if it was readily available.Your domain names aren't that old, so most people would definitely think you are lying.Thank you for your valuable comment! We sincerely appreciate your input and will consider your suggestions.Our experience spans over 12 years in financial markets beyond cryptocurrency exchange services.

comments.author: joniboini
comments.body: Quote from: Buycoin.Online on December 14, 2023, 09:46:57 AMOur experience spans over 12 years in financial markets beyond cryptocurrency exchange services.I think his point is that you should show us your portfolio. I don't think it is a problem if you list which companies you work for, what business you did in the past, and so on. Simply saying you have 10 years of experience tells nothing. In fact, scammers use that quite often to trick users. If you're serious about it, maybe you can be a little bit more open about your work history.

comments.author: Darker45
comments.body: Quote from: Buycoin.Online on December 13, 2023, 02:40:20 PMWe have been working in the financial market since 2011. Thanks to this, we know all the nuances of the industry and can advise on almost any issue.Huge claim! Working in the traditional financial market doesn't automatically mean you know all the nuances of the crypto industry. They aren't the same. You only need to hear from the giants in the traditional finance market and realize that many of them are clueless about Bitcoin. Jamie Dimon has been much respected in the financial market decades before 2011 and he surely cannot "advise on almost any issue" relating to Bitcoin. Anyway, the platform was only launched in 2019 as a project of Buycoin sp. z o. o.? So, Buycoin sp. z o. o. is the company that's been running for 11 years? However, there's information online that this company's incorporation date was April 12, 2023.[1] What have I missed?[1] https://www.emis.com/php/company-profile/PL/Buycoin_Sp_z_oo_en_14347842.html

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: Quote from: Buycoin.Online on December 13, 2023, 02:40:20 PMLarge reserveAny cryptocurrency and fiat funds in the right quantities.Can you sign a message or do Prove Of Reserves (POR) ? If that is not possible, there is no need to mention Large reserve, otherwise proof is obligatory.Your website mentioned 10K satisfied customers, and I did not find links to some models from these satisfied customers. Did they leave them on social media or where?Quote from: Buycoin.Online on December 14, 2023, 09:46:57 AMThank you for your valuable comment! We sincerely appreciate your input and will consider your suggestions.Our experience spans over 12 years in financial markets beyond cryptocurrency exchange services.This is not true. You clearly mentioned More than 10 Years on the market, not years of experience, or the meaning of what they say is that the platform has been in existence for 10 years.

comments.author: Best_Change
comments.body: Exchanger buycoin.online has been added to our monitor BestChange.We have analyzed information about the service’s work, its reputation, principles, and values of its administration and came to the conclusion that buycoin.online satisfies the criteria for a reliable partner and can be listed in BestChange, among other exchangers.We sincerely hope for productive and long-term cooperation with this service. Despite the successful passing of all the checks, we will keep an eye on its reputation and the development of the client service.We recommend you always check the review page https://www.bestchange.com/buycoin-exchanger.html After an exchange, please share your opinion about the provided service with others.

comments.author: bhadz
comments.body: You may have that boasting of experience in the financial markets but it's still a different thing when its come to cryptocurrencies. But that claim of yours, I guess that experience really is helping but you'll still have a different approach from it. And don't forget to say about KYC. This is where most of the users are going to take complains against you. You have not mentioned it on your features but on your website, it is clearly saying that you need one for it in case that you find some triggers on a user exchanging you. Unlike the other good instant swaps, most of the centralized swaps are a pain when you all of a sudden asks for it.

comments.author: joniboini
comments.body: Quote from: Best_Change on December 25, 2023, 07:53:42 AMWe have analyzed information about the service’s work, its reputation, principles, and values of its administration and came to the conclusion that buycoin.online satisfies the criteria for a reliable partner and can be listed in BestChange, among other exchangers.Do you have access to additional information they didn't share in this thread? They provide nothing to verify from the reserves to their work history. I do think it would be better if you register a new partner that is a bit more open to its customers since they work in a centralized exchange industry. As far as I can see, OP's service is quite questionable for now. It would be nice if you added more details to alert users about the risks.

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: Quote from: Best_Change on December 25, 2023, 07:53:42 AMExchanger buycoin.online has been added to our monitor BestChange.The information in the link says that you do not recommend this exchangeQuotePlease note that this exchanger was delisted from the monitor on long ago. Currently, we cannot advise using Buycoin to perform exchanges. We will also be unable to provide any assistance in resolving problems, shall they occur. Please be cautious and alert. We recommend choosing trustworthy exchangers among those that are active on our monitor.The platform's status is disabled and there are no reviews for it, so it is better for no one to use Buycoin.online. Using them may lead you to lose your money.https://www.bestchange.com/buycoin-exchanger.htmlQuote from: joniboini on December 26, 2023, 04:00:30 AMDo you have access to additional information they didn't share in this thread? They provide nothing to verify from the reserves to their work history. I do think it would be better if you register a new partner that is a bit more open to its customers since they work in a centralized exchange industry. As far as I can see, OP's service is quite questionable for now. It would be nice if you added more details to alert users about the risks.It appears that there is an error or they have changed the current state and it is not recommended to use it.

comments.author: Buycoin.Online
comments.body: All technical issues have been successfully resolved, and our service is now accessible on the Bestchange monitor. We sincerely appreciate the opportunity to collaborate with such a reputable platform and express gratitude to all forum participants for their suggestions regarding improvements to our service.

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: Quote from: Buycoin.Online on January 16, 2024, 10:12:12 AMAll technical issues have been successfully resolved, and our service is now accessible on the Bestchange monitor. We sincerely appreciate the opportunity to collaborate with such a reputable platform and express gratitude to all forum participants for their suggestions regarding improvements to our service.The smallest amount is a little much, as 0.00202 is worth more than $80 at current prices. Is it possible to reduce it a little?I see that the maximum amount is 236303, which is 236k BTC. This is a very huge amount for a small platform. Can you sign a message or do Prove Of Reserves (POR)?All of these claims are inaccurate More than 10 years on the market and the domain registration date is 2023-11-06? Over 10K satisfied customers and there are no positive or negative reviews on the Internet.
